part_description: Two rectangular switches, side by side, on a square base.
internal_interaction_description: Each switch operates independently, allowing for separate control of connected circuits. They are aligned parallel and are mounted on a shared base which houses the internal electrical components necessary for operation.
external_interaction_description: The light switch is typically mounted on a wall and interacts with external electrical circuits to control lighting. Users press the switches to turn lights on or off, providing a tactile interface for managing room illumination.
